violations: Workers in proximity to scattered debris
Improper equipment usage (potential lack of structural support)
locations: Near the center of the image, workers without hard hats
Throughout the site, especially the scattered wooden planks
Left side of the image where scaffolding appears unstable
Middle to right, pathway blocked by debris
recommendations: Ensure all workers are wearing hard hats.
Clear debris to minimize trip hazards.
Secure scaffolding and ensure proper assembly.
Remove debris to clear the blocked pathways.
worker_positions: Bottom left, near the center facing towards the debris
Bottom left, back to the camera facing towards the site

worker_identifiers.features: Yellow vest, no helmet, standing to the left
Yellow vest, no helmet, back to camera
